text: Maharaja Ahibaran was the 12th century ancestor King of Baranshahr (Bulandshahr). Originated from Baran,rajasthan .The Modi/Barnwal and Rajvanshi communities claim descent from him. Ahibaran was a Sooryavanshi kshatriya, He is credited with the establishment of a kingdom of traders in North India. Category:Legendary Indian Hindu people
title: Ahivarn
